languages.text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Когда во время {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} псайкера уровень {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} впервые достигает 200, псайкер получает +5 к каждой {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристике{/g}, +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}, +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} и +1 к любому урону, который псайкер наносит, до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: The first time momentum reaches 200 during the Psyker's turn, the Psyker gains +5 to all characteristics, +1 to resolve, +1 to deflection, and +1 to all damage that the Psyker deals until the end of combat.

The first time that momentum reaches 200 during the psyker's turn, the psyker gains +5 to all characteristics, +1 to resolve, +1 to deflection, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда во время {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} псайкера уровень {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g} впервые достигает 200, псайкер получает +5 к каждой {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристике{/g}, +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}, +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g} и +1 к любому урону, который псайкер наносит, до конца боя.
languages.original_text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Когда во время {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} псайкера уровень моментума впервые достигает 200, псайкер получает +5 к каждой характеристике, +1 к решимости, +1 к отражению и +1 к любому урону, который псайкер наносит, до конца боя.

Когда во время {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} псайкера уровень моментума впервые достигает 200, псайкер получает +5 к каждой характеристике, +1 к решимости, +1 к отражению и +1 к любому урону, который псайкер наносит, до конца боя.

languages.text: 在灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，当灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}首次达到200点时，灵能者获得以下加成效果：所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}+5，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}+1，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}+1，造成的所有伤害+1，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 在灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，当灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}首次达到200点时，灵能者获得以下加成效果：所有属性+5，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}+1，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}+1，造成的所有伤害+1，效果持续至战斗结束。

在灵能者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，当灵能者{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}首次达到200点时，灵能者获得以下加成效果：所有{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}+5，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}+1，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}+1，造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}+1，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: La primera vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} llegue a 200 durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del psíquico, este gana +5 en todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g}, +1 al {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}, +1 al {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y +1 a todo el daño que inflija hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: La primera vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} llegue a 200 durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del psíquico, este gana +5 en todas sus características, +1 al {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g}, +1 al {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y +1 a todo el daño que inflija hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} zum ersten Mal während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Psionikers 200 erreicht, erhält er +5 auf alle {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}, +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}, +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und +1 auf alle Schäden, die der Psioniker bis zum Ende des Zuges zufügt.
languages.original_text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} zum ersten Mal während der {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} des Psionikers 200 erreicht, erhält er +5 auf alle Eigenschaften, +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}, +1 auf {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} und +1 auf alle Schäden, die der Psioniker bis zum Ende der Runde zufügt.

languages.text: La première fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} atteint 200 pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du psyker, celui-ci reçoit les bonus suivants : +5 à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g}, +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}, +1 à la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} et +1 à tous les dégâts qu'il inflige jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: La première fois que la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} atteint 200 pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du psyker, celui-ci reçoit les bonus suivants : +5 sur toutes les caractéristiques, +1 sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}, +1 sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} et +1 sur tous les dégâts qu'il inflige jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: 異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中にはじめて{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が200になった時、戦闘終了までこの異能者のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}が+5、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流{/g}しが+1、この異能者が与える全てのダメージが+1増加する。
languages.original_text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 異能者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中にはじめて{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が200になった時、戦闘終了までこの異能者のすべての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}が+5、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1、{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流{/g}しが+1、この異能者が与える全てのダメージが+1増加する。

languages.text: Ruhsezerin {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} sırasında {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} ilk kez 200'e ulaştığında ruhsezer; tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +5, {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerine +1 ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerine +1 kazanır. Ayrıca vereceği tüm hasarlar da +1 artar. Tüm bu etkiler, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: The first time that {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} reaches 200 during the psyker's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the psyker gains +5 to all {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}, +1 to {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and +1 to all damage that the psyker deals until the end of combat.
